ErrorResponse.description:
统一错误响应格式（Pinned Error Contract）。

该结构最初用于 v2，但在“合并 v2 到 v1（仅保留 /api/v1）”后，
服务端对外统一使用此错误响应格式，便于客户端与 Web 端做一致的错误解析。
ErrorResponse.title: ErrorResponse

parameters.description: Optional client-provided request id; echoed back in responses.
parameters.name: X-Request-Id

parameters.description: Optional client-provided request id; echoed back in responses.
parameters.name: X-Request-Id

post.description:
Clear the user session cookie.

- Idempotent: OK even when already logged out.
- If a valid cookie-session exists, enforce CSRF to prevent cross-site logout.
- Bearer-token clients should not need CSRF for this endpoint.
